snippet: Lance Cooper, a lawyer who helped bring a deadly switch defect to light, says a lead lawyer for the plaintiffs is putting his own financial interests ahead of the case.
abstract: Lawyers for plaintiffs suing General Motors over its flawed ignition switch tangle; attorney Lance Cooper urges judge to remove Robert C Hilliard from co-lead in case, arguing he is putting his own financial interests ahead of those of other lawyers.
lead_paragraph: Lance Cooper, a lawyer who helped bring a deadly switch defect to light, says a lead lawyer for the plaintiffs is putting his own financial interests ahead of the case.

headline.main: Lawyer for Plaintiffs Suing G.M. Steps Up Criticism of Another
headline.print_headline: One Lawyer for Plaintiffs Suing G.M. Steps Up Criticism of Another
